Size. Your size is Medium (tall).

sheet.description: Your unarmed strikes deal 1d4 kinetic damage.

description.p: Your hit point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 every time you gain a level.
When you are reduced to 0 hit points, you can drop to 1 hit point instead once per long rest.

sheet.description: +1 HP per level. Once per long rest, when reduced to 0 HP, drop to 1 HP instead.

description.p: Your unarmed strikes deal 1d6 kinetic damage instead of the normal bludgeoning damage.

sheet.description: Your unarmed strikes deal 1d6 kinetic damage.

description.p: You are vulnerable to ion damage.
